doc:
Lexie Bigham https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lexie_Bigham 0 Lexie Donnell Bigham Jr. (August 4, 1968 – December 17, 1995) was an American film and television actor. Bigham appeared in numerous independent films and television series. His prominent roles came in the films Se7en, Boyz n the Hood, South Central, Dave, Drop Zone, Airheads, Up Close Personal, the Marlon and Shawn Wayans film, Don't Be a Menace to South Central While Drinking Your Juice in the Hood, and High School High. Bigham died in a car accident in Los Angeles on December 17, 1995 at the age of 27, shortly after filming High School High. Lexie_Donnell_Bigham_Jr. ( August_4_,_1968 – December_17_,_1995 ) was an_American_film_and_television_actor . Bigham appeared in numerous_independent_films_and_television_series . His_prominent_roles came in the_films_Se7en , Boyz n the_Hood , South_Central , Dave , Drop_Zone , Airheads , Up Close_ , the_Marlon_and_Shawn_Wayans_film , Do_n't_Be a_Menace to South_Central While Drinking Your_Juice in the_Hood , and High_School_High . Bigham died in a_car_accident in Los_Angeles on December_17_,_1995 at the_age of 27 , shortly after filming High_School_High .
